import React, { useState } from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Postcourse from './Postcourse'; import Files from './Files'; import Sections from './Sections'; const Createcourse = () => { const [isActive1, setActive1] = useState(true) const [isActive2, setActive2] = useState(false) const [isActive3, setActive3] = useState(false) const handleClick1 = () => { setActive1(true) setActive2(false) setActive3(false) } const handleClick2 = () => { setActive1(false) setActive2(true) setActive3(false) } const handleClick3 = () => { setActive2(false) setActive3(true) setActive1(false) } return (
